markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Deinosuchus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=85)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The deinosuchus is a primeval relative of the crocodile, and is an enormous predator capable of catching and eating dinosaurs that wander too close to its domain!

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 26

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 24

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 9">[Deinosuchus](/Monsters.aspx?ID=85)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Huge" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 67</row>

**Perception** +17; low-light vision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +20, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +7

**Dex** +3

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -4
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 26 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +16 

**Will** +15 

</row>

**HP** 175

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, swim 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +22 ([reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d10+13 piercing plus Grab

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +20 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d10+11 bludgeoning

**[Aquatic Ambush](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=2)** <actions string="Single Action" />  50 feet

**Deep Breath**   A deinosuchus can hold its breath for about 2 hours.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Large, 2d8+7 bludgeoning, Rupture 18

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-24" />
name: Deinosuchus
